00011 template<class SOURCE> 
00012 class RecipieOf :
00013         public Counted
00014 {
00015         typedef typename SOURCE::type_point POINT;
00016         typedef typename SOURCE::type_data DATA;
00017         typedef typename SOURCE::type_precision PRECISION;
00018 public:
00019         typedef typename SOURCE::type_point type_point;
00020         typedef typename SOURCE::type_data type_data;
00021         static const int type_dimensionality = SOURCE::type_dimensionality;
00022         typedef typename SOURCE::type_precision type_precision;
00023         typedef SOURCE type_source;
00024 
00025 private:
00026         int m_csrc;
00027         SOURCE* m_vsrcFinal;
00028 
00029 protected:
00030         // must call
00031         RecipieOf()
00032                 : Counted()
00033                 , m_csrc(0)
00034                 , m_vsrcFinal(NULL)
00035         {
00036         }
00037 
00041         void SetSource(int c, SOURCE* vsrc)
00042         {
00043                 m_csrc=c;
00044                 m_vsrcFinal=vsrc;
00045         }
00046 
00047 public:
00049         virtual void RegisterParameters( 
00050                 RegistryOfParameters& regParam
00051         ) =0;
00052

00055                 RegistryOfInitialSteps& regSteps
00056         ) =0;
00057

00059 
00060 public:
00061         virtual ~RecipieOf() __attribute__((always_inline))
00062         {
00063         }
00064 
00066         virtual const POINT& Size() const 
00067         {
00068                 return m_vsrcFinal[0].Size();
00069         }
00070 
00072         virtual PRECISION CSize() const
00073         {
00074                 return m_vsrcFinal[0].CSize();
00075         }
00076 
00078         virtual void GetPoint(DATA* vdataOut, const POINT& pt) const
00079         {
00080                 for (int n=0; n<m_csrc; n++){
00081 			::GetPoint(m_vsrcFinal[n],vdataOut[n],pt);
00082                 }
00083         }
00084 
00086         virtual void PrepareForAccess() const {
00087                 for (int n=0; n<m_csrc; n++){
00088                         m_vsrcFinal[n].PrepareForAccess();
00089                 }
00090         }
00091 
00094         virtual void PrepareForAccess(int n) const {
00095                 m_vsrcFinal[n].PrepareForAccess();
00096         }
00097 
00099         virtual String Describe() const
00100         {
00101                 String s;
00102                 for (int n=0; n<m_csrc; n++){
00103                         s=s+(
00104                                 _LINE + "Source " + n + LINE_ + 
00105                                 (_INDENT + m_vsrcFinal[n].Describe()) 
00106                         );
00107                 }
00108 
00109                 return (
00110                         _LINE + "Recipie with " + m_csrc + LINE_
00111                         + s
00112                 );
00113         }
00114 
00116         virtual int CSources() const
00117         {
00118                 return m_csrc;
00119         }
00120 
00123         virtual SOURCE* PSource(int n){
00124                 return &m_vsrcFinal[n];
00125         }
00126 
00129         virtual const SOURCE* PSource(int n) const{
00130                 return &m_vsrcFinal[n];
00131         }
00132 
00134         virtual SOURCE* VSources(){
00135                 return m_vsrcFinal;
00136         }
00137 
00140         template <class SOURCE_OUT>
00141         void AllocatedCopies(SOURCE_OUT* viOut)
00142         {
00143                 int c=this->CSources();
00144                 for (int n=0; n<c; n++){
00145 			::AllocatedCopy(viOut[n], m_vsrcFinal[n]);
00146                 }
00147         }
00148 
00150         static String SerializationId()
00151         {
00152                 return "Recipie";
00153         }
00154

00157         { 
00158                 for (int n=0; n<m_csrc; n++){
00159 			::Serialize(st,m_vsrcFinal[n]);
00160                 }

00165         {

00178 //=============================================================================
00179 // MAKE RECIPIE PARTS
00180 //=============================================================================
00181 // warning: these are "unclean" macros in that they make use of variables
00182 // within the MAKE_RECIPIE macro below (e.g. c, n)
00183 #define _RECIPIE_TYPES(_name,_class,_data,_dims,_precision,_source)                                             \
00184         typedef _class<_data,_dims,_precision,LAYER_##_source> LAYER_##_name; 
00185 
00186 #define _RECIPIE_STORAGE_TYPE(_name,_class,_data,_dims,_precision,_source)              \
00187         PRIVATE::LAYER_##_name
00188 
00189 //      _class<_data,_dims,_precision,PRIVATE::LAYER_##_source> 
00190 
00191 #define _RECIPIE_STORAGE(_name,_class,_data,_dims,_precision,_source)                                   \
00192         PRIVATE::LAYER_##_name* m_vsrc##_name;                                                                                                                                                  \
00193         bool m_bOptimize##_name;
00194 
00195 #define _RECIPIE_ACCESSOR(_name,_class,_data,_dims,_precision,_source)                          \
00196         PRIVATE::LAYER_##_name& Layer##_name(int n){    return m_vsrc##_name[n];        }               \
00197         void OptimizeLayer##_name(bool b){      m_bOptimize##_name=b;   }                                                                       
00198 
00199 #define _RECIPIE_OPTIMIZELAYERDEFAULT(_name,_class,_data,_dims,_precision,_source) \
00200         m_bOptimize##_name=true;
00201 
00202 #define _RECIPIE_ALLOCATELAYER(_name,_class,_data,_dims,_precision,_source)             \
00203         m_vsrc##_name = new PRIVATE::LAYER_##_name[c];
00204 
00205 #define _RECIPIE_DELETELAYER(_name,_class,_data,_dims,_precision,_source)                       \
00206         for (int n=CSources()-1; n>=0; n--){                                                                                                                                                            \
00207                 m_vsrc##_name[n].WipeSource();                                                                                                                                                                          \
00208         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00209         delete [] m_vsrc##_name;                                                                                                                                                                                                                
00210 
00211 #define _RECIPIE_SETSOURCE(_name,_class,_data,_dims,_precision,_source)                         \
00212         m_vsrc##_name[n].SetSource(&m_vsrc##_source[n]);
00213 
00214 #define _RECIPIE_SETLASTSOURCE(_name,_class,_data,_dims,_precision,_source)             \
00215         this->SetSource(c,m_vsrc##_name);
00216 
00217 #define _RECIPIE_REGISTER_PARAMS(_name,_class,_data,_dims,_precision,_source)   \
00218         if (m_bOptimize##_name){                                                                                                                                                                                                                \
00219                 Layer##_name(n).RegisterParameters(regParam);                                                                                                                   \
00220         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
00221 
00222 #define _RECIPIE_REGISTER_INITIALSTEPS(_name,_class,_data,_dims,_precision,_source)     \
00223         if (m_bOptimize##_name){                                                                                                                                                                                                                \
00224                 ::RegisterInitialSteps(Layer##_name(n), regSteps);                                                                                              \
00225         }
00226 
00227 #define _RECIPIE_NORMALIZE(_name,_class,_data,_dims,_precision,_source)                         \
00228         if (m_bOptimize##_name){                                                                                                                                                                                                                \
00229                 NormalizeGroup(this->CSources(),m_vsrc##_name);                                                                                                         \
00230         }
00231 
00232 #define _RECIPIE_COUNT(_name,_class,_data,_dims,_precision,_source)                                             \
00233         +1
00234 
00235 #define _RECIPIE_DESCRIBE(_name,_class,_data,_dims,_precision,_source)                          \
00236         Layer##_name(n).Describe();
00237 
00238 #define CONCAT2(x,y) x ## y
00239 #define CONCAT(x,y) CONCAT2(x,y)
00240 
00241 #define PRIVATE CONCAT(_privateNS,__LINE__)

00255 #define MAKE_RECIPIE(                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   \
00256         _recipie,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00257         _source,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                \
00258         _do_mid_layers,                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 \
00259         _do_last_layer                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  \
00260 )                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00261         namespace PRIVATE {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     \
00262                 typedef _source LAYER_INPUT;                                                                                                                                                                                    \
00263                 _do_mid_layers(_RECIPIE_TYPES);                                                                                                                                                                         \
00264                 _do_last_layer(_RECIPIE_TYPES);                                                                                                                                                                         \
00265         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00266                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         \
00267         class _recipie                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  \
00268                 : public RecipieOf<_do_last_layer(_RECIPIE_STORAGE_TYPE)>                                                                       \
00269         {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00270                 protected:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              \
00271                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         \
00272                 PRIVATE::LAYER_INPUT* m_vsrcINPUT;                                                                                                                                                              \
00273                 _do_mid_layers(_RECIPIE_STORAGE);                                                                                                                                                                       \
00274                 _do_last_layer(_RECIPIE_STORAGE);                                                                                                                                                                       \
00275                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         \
00276                 public:                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         \
00277                 _recipie(int c, _source* vsrcInput)                                                                                                                                                             \
00278                 : RecipieOf<_do_last_layer(_RECIPIE_STORAGE_TYPE)>()                                                                                    \
00279                 {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00280                         m_vsrcINPUT=vsrcInput;                                                                                                                                                                                                  \
00281                         _do_mid_layers(_RECIPIE_ALLOCATELAYER);                                                                                                                                 \
00282                         _do_last_layer(_RECIPIE_ALLOCATELAYER);                                                                                                                                 \
00283                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         \
00284                         _do_mid_layers(_RECIPIE_OPTIMIZELAYERDEFAULT);                                                                                                  \
00285                         _do_last_layer(_RECIPIE_OPTIMIZELAYERDEFAULT);                                                                                                  \
00286                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         \
00287                         for (int n=0; n<c; n++){                                                                                                                                                                                                \
00288                                 _do_mid_layers(_RECIPIE_SETSOURCE);                                                                                                                                             \
00289                                 _do_last_layer(_RECIPIE_SETSOURCE);                                                                                                                                             \
00290                         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00291                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         \
00292                         _do_last_layer(_RECIPIE_SETLASTSOURCE);                                                                                                                                 \
00293                 }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00294                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         \
00295                 ~_recipie()                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             \
00296                 {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00297                         if (AboutToDie()){                                                                                                                                                                                                                      \
00298                                 _do_mid_layers(_RECIPIE_DELETELAYER);                                                                                                                                   \
00299                                 _do_last_layer(_RECIPIE_DELETELAYER);                                                                                                                                   \
00300                         }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               \
00301                 }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00302                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         \
00303                 int CLayers() const                                                                                                                                                                                                                             \
00304                 {                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00305                         return (                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                \
00306                                 _do_mid_layers(_RECIPIE_COUNT)                                                                                                                                                          \
00307                                 _do_last_layer(_RECIPIE_COUNT)                                                                                                                                                          \
00308                         );                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      \
00309                 }                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       \
00310                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         \
00311                 virtual String Describe()       const                                                                                                                                                                           \
